title: cinnak-kaiyai
sahitya:
cinnak kaiyai virittenniDam veNNai kELAyO kaNNanE nILa vaNNanE un


anupallavi

  suruL kuzhal tavazh mukham kATTAyO aruL vizhiyAl ennai ATkoLLAyO un


caraNam    iru karattAl ennai aNaindiDa vArAyO siru padathAl maDi tugaitiDAyO
Udu kuzhalAl ennai vaLaittiDAyO Odu nin aruL mozhiyAl enai tiruttiDAyO
				(madhyamakAla)
padamO siru padam ulagaLandiDum un karamO adu aNDam kAttiDum
kaNgaLO karuNai pozhindiDum yashOdai magizh gOvindA un
